## AuthContainer.updateLoginID() method

Updates specified login ID for current user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateLoginID(oldLoginID: {
        [key: string]: string;
    }, newLoginID: {
        [key: string]: string;
    }): Promise<User>;
```
